chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Access Control is a client and server authentication and authorization implementation for user and group management.
It has LDAP as default persistence layer built-ina and it provides a RESTful interface to authentication, authorization and user and group management.

section.title: Requirements and recomendations
section.para: Prerequisites and recomendations to run the Access Control Service are:

listitem.para: A Tomcat 7 installation with SSL/TLS support enabled is required,
An LDAP installation supporting the memberOf feature and secure connection is required. 389 Directory Server is recommended.
